Assessment.QuestionText: Can you match the properties, methods, and events of the <font face="courier new">ToolStrip</font> class against their corresponding descriptions?

Options.Option: Event that occurs when an item is clicked.
Property that is used to identify the displayed image.
Method that displays the control to the user.
Property that retrieves all the items of the control.
Property that identifies the layout style of the items.

Assessment.CorrectFeedback: Yes, that's correct! You get one point for your response.
Assessment.incorrectFeedback: No, that's incorrect. The correct combinations are: (A)-(4), (B)-(3), (C)-(5), (D)-(1), and (E)-(2).
